ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: label filter should show something if there is no label
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior When we would like to filter the `Issues` according to the `Label`. If there is no label then it should show something like there is no label. ### Steps to reproduce 1. Create a `Project` 2. Go to the `Project` and create a new `Issue` without any label 3. Filter the `Issues` from the header options 4. Click on the `Label` option ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Cloud
